nodes.text: The Raddan system was a star system that was located in the Tharin sector, within the Outer Rim Territories and the Slice regions. The system was the origin point of the article of clothing known as the Raddan vermin-killer's vest.
The Raddan system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the system in grid square S-8.
